# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/neo4j`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for neo4j (https://github.com/thingdom/node-neo4j).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/neo4j.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Tue, 07 Nov 2023 09:09:39 GMT
 * Dependencies: [@types/request](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/request)
